% This Document is a real bare document. The Document is generated by using some
% Commands:
% * \Building
% * \Room
% * \Conference
% * \Area
% * \Floor
%
% The Output File is A4 Landscape
\documentclass[a4paper]{article}
\usepackage{vsl}

\renewcommand\Building{Freihaus}
\renewcommand\Room{Seminarraum 111A}
\renewcommand\Conference{ABCD}
\renewcommand\Area{Stiege III}
\renewcommand\Floor{2nd Floor}

\begin{document}
\AddToShipoutPicture*{\BackgroundPic}

\printVSL

\end{document}
